about.description: Singapore E50DAO is a technology company that focuses on the research, development, production and sales of high-end composite materials such as carbon fiber and Kevlar. The company has modern factories and a complete industrial chain service system, covering the entire process of product design, molding, manufacturing, assembly and testing. Through the deep integration of digital technology and advanced processes, E5DAO can efficiently respond to customer customization needs and provide lightweight, high-strength, and excellent weather-resistant professional composite material solutions. The products are widely used in military, aerospace, medical, rescue, outdoor equipment, and high-end transportation.

cardOne.title: Carbon Fiber Overall Solution Plan
cardOne.content: Carbon fiber box-type mobile command site system (In modern warfare, with the widespread use of high-altitude reconnaissance equipment and long-range firepower weapons, the survival ability of fixed command posts in frontline positions and rear areas in war is getting lower and lower. In the absence of command, it is difficult for the army to complete effective attack, defense and coordinated operations of various arms. In the Russian-Ukrainian war, due to the lack of modern command posts on the front line, the Russian side had to go to the front line to understand the front-line combat situation in real time. As a result, a large number of senior commanders were killed. Therefore, front-line commanders urgently need a lightweight, highly integrated, highly informationized, quickly deployable and quickly withdrawn mobile command post to convey combat assignments to individual soldiers and pass on the front-line combat situation to the upper-level command agency. Carry the "command post" on your shoulders and hold the "information power" in your hands
